pages.text: $(thing)渦流管/$是一台基於$(l:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/vortex_tube)現實物理/$的機器。其將$(l:base_concepts/pressure)空氣/$流分離為$(l:base_concepts/heat)熱和冷/$的部分，從而將渦流管的一側加熱，另一側冷卻。註：冷熱兩側具有熱連接，因此要使用熱側時建議對冷側散熱，使用冷側時同理。這可以使用$(l:machines/heat_sink)散熱器/$做到。

When you place down or rotate a $(thing)Vortex Tube/$, the hot end will face toward you. Note that each end has a narrow red or blue band indicating which is which.$(p)Pressurized air is required to make the $(thing)Vortex Tube/$ work. Higher pressure leads to greater temperature differentials, but air will also be used at a greater rate.
